Specialization in Games: Production and Programming

Game engine, game design, narrative applied to digital games, algorithms and programming for games, 3d modeling and rendering, mobile devices and portability, interface design, animation, network game programming, artificial intelligence, gamification and research methodology, production of games, entrepreneurship, music and sound effect and completion work.

Computer architecture, fundamentals of operating systems, data structure, programming practice (c language), practice in operating systems, database, search and ordering, software engineering, database management, programming language (java) , internet development, software project management, compilers and computability, computer graphics and image processing, software quality and computer networks.
